text: Mogambo is a 1953 American British romantic adventure movie directed by John Ford is based on the play Red Dust by Wilson Collison and had been previously filmed in 1932. It stars Clark Gable, Ava Gardner, Grace Kelly, Donald Sinden and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1954. ==Other websites== * * Category:1953 romance movies Category:1953 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:British adventure movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford
title: Mogambo
